name: deport
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to force someone to leave a country, especially someone who has no legal right to be there or who has broken the law: Thousands of illegal immigrants are caught and deported every year. The refugees were deported back to their country of origin. Compare
extradite
exile verb

Punishing someone by sending them somewhere else

deportation

expulsion
extraordinary rendition
rid
rusticate
rustication
send
send someone down
send something off
shun
transport

to force a person to leave a country: The government hopes to deport the criminals. deportation noun [ C/U ] us
